response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special price of $1,300,000. This offer is tailored to reflect its true worth while providing you with a competitive advantage. We understand its value to you is estimated at $1,200,000, and we aim to bridge the gap in a manner that benefits both parties. Should you decide to proceed, we promise a seamless transaction with excellent customer service and support throughout the process. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1300000}
